com.csharp.sharedclasses.fontyspublisher

Interface IRemotePublisherForListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RemotePublisher

    public interface IRemotePublisherForListener
extends java.rmi.Remote
    IRemotePublisherForListener. Interface to remote publisher in order to subscribe and unsubscribe listeners to properties. In case a property changes in the domain, all listeners subscribed to that property will be informed through a (remote) method invocation of propertyChange(). Listeners subscribed to the null-String are by definition subscribed to all properties.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void subscribeRemoteListener(IRemotePropertyListener listener, java.lang.String property)
      Subscribe remote property listener.
      void unsubscribeRemoteListener(IRemotePropertyListener listener, java.lang.String property)
      Unsubscribe remote property listener.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribeRemoteListener

        void subscribeRemoteListener(IRemotePropertyListener listener,
                             java.lang.String property)
                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Subscribe remote property listener. Remote listener will be subscribed to given property. In case given property is the null-String, the listener will be subscribed to all properties.
        Parameters:
        listener - remote property listener to be subscribed
        property - null-String allowed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • unsubscribeRemoteListener

        void unsubscribeRemoteListener(IRemotePropertyListener listener,
                               java.lang.String property)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Unsubscribe remote property listener. Remote listener will be unsubscribed from given property. In case given property is the null-string, the listener will be unsubscribed from all properties.
        Parameters:
        listener - property listener to be unsubscribed
        property - null-String allowed
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
